rows.label: tev036801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev036801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Heradot about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev036801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev036801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Heradot about recent developments.

rows.label: tev036801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Heradot about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev036801_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Heradot about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev036801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Heradot about recent developments.

rows.label: tev036801_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Heradot about recent developments.

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0001
rows.name:
The outside of our ship's hull uses cutting-edge laser
coating, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0002
rows.name:
It can repel heavy fire from even the nastiest Ganglion
energy weapon, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, the engineers didn't account for for more basic
weaponry like missiles. Because no one fights with
missiles in space, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0004
rows.name:
Once the Ganglion found out and set up artillery,
we were in in some pretty hot water, weren't we?
It's a good thing you you you bailed us out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0009
rows.name: I'm working on upgrading the ship's armor, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0010
rows.name: ...What's that? It's not safe out here? Nonsense![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'll have you know that I'm the most limber, athletic
Ma-non you'll ever meet! ...Er, probably?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Regardless, I can handle a few repairs 300 meters off
the ground without a safety net, so that has to count
for something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0017
rows.name:
The outside of our ship's hull already had a special
laser coating technology, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0018
rows.name:
But I spoke with Engine Chief Vyponne, and we decided
we needed to add armor that could handle Ganglion
missiles and the like. A superbarrier, if you follow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0019
rows.name:
Thanks to that, we were able to shrug off all of their
efforts during the attack on on the city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG0020
rows.name:
There will be no more repeats of Oblivia, okay?
We'll never be caught with our pants down again,
as you humans say! ...Er, you DO say that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1001
rows.name:
Vyponne suggested we whip up some armor to protect
the engine...or the ship's power source, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1002
rows.name:
Now the ship can can handle anything: lasers, missiles,
sonic weapons, dark weapons... You name it, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1003
rows.name:
I almost WANT to see the Ganglion try to destroy it!
...Er, but not really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1004
rows.name:
Me and the other technicians couldn't have built it
without Vyponne, though. No one else knows our ship's
power source inside and out like that, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1005
rows.name:
So even if more Ganglion forces are still out there,
we'll probably never need to be scared again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1010
rows.name:
You gave those enemies that shot me a proper
thrashing, right? Thanks for for for that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1011
rows.name:
I'm glad Bihabba had the presence of mind to tell you
I was in trouble, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1012
rows.name:
I made sure it's a known secret on the ship that you're
the human to count on, if that's all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG1013
rows.name:
Anyway, don't be surprised if your popularity goes
way way up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG2001
rows.name:
Pizza for breakfast. Pizza for lunch. Pizza for
second lunch. I've been spending myself right into
pizza heaven, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG2002
rows.name:
But I think I may have eaten too much, maybe?
I don't feel quite as limber as I usually am...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev036801_MSG2003
rows.name:
But no one's going to shoot at me anymore, right?
So so less worrying, more pizza scarfing![ST:wait ]
